channel.title: Making A Scene with Matt Lucas and David Walliams

Reliving key scenes from their guestsâ€™ lives, they'll discuss who would play them? What kind of movie their life would be? and most importantlyâ€¦ whether it would be a box-office smash or go straight in the bargain bin? New episodes release every Tuesday, and on Thursdays make sure to look out forÂ You Canâ€™t Ask Me That!â€”The bonus show, where Matt and David tackle Listeners questions. No matter how awkward, bold, or outrageous!

channel.content:encoded:
Welcome to Making A Scene, the podcast where comedy legends David Walliams and Matt Lucas turn their famous friends' lives into cinematic masterpieces!

Reliving key scenes from their guestsâ€™ lives, they'll discuss who would play them? What kind of movie their life would be? and most importantlyâ€¦ whether it would be a box-office smash or go straight in the bargain bin?

New episodes release every Tuesday, and on Thursdays make sure to look out forÂ You Canâ€™t Ask Me That!â€”The bonus show, where Matt and David tackle Listeners questions. No matter how awkward, bold, or outrageous!

item.title: We're Back Together!
item.description:
After 15 years, the legendary comedy duo Matt Lucas and David Walliams are finally reunited - with a brand new podcastâ€¦ MAKING A SCENE ðŸŽ¬
Join them twice a week on Tuesdays and Thursdays (from the 4th February) as they turn the lives of their famous friends into cinematic masterpieces, and tackle YOUR questions â€“ no matter how awkward, bold, or outrageous â€“ in bonus pod You Canâ€™t Ask Me That!
Listen or watch every Tuesday and Thursday.
You can email your questions and messages for the podcast to makingascene@platformmedia.uk
And find Making A Scene on TikTok, Instagram and Facebook Just search @makingascenepod Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
